user_instruction: 'Send an update to my coworker Sarah (sarah.thompson@cch.org) about our current projects. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah.thompson@cch.org"],"subject":"Update on Current Projects","body":"Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well! Here’s the latest update on our current projects:

1. **Vax4All Initiative**
   - This is a vaccination drive organized by CCH to increase vaccination rates in Oakwood Village.
   - We are setting up temporary vaccination sites, coordinating with local healthcare providers, and conducting outreach to educate the community about the importance of vaccines.
   - You can find more details here: [Vax4All Initiative Details](https://www.notion.so/Vax4All-Initiative-Details-1f20dc8fa0db81c388f7c29239c16fd6).

2. **HEAP Project**
   - The Health Empowerment and Awareness Program (HEAP) focuses on improving community health literacy and empowering residents to make informed health decisions.
   - Key activities include holding educational workshops, distributing informational pamphlets, and developing interactive web resources.
   - More information is available here: [HEAP Project Overview](https://www.notion.so/HEAP-Project-Overview-1f20dc8fa0db8137bdb0d61b57563746).

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about these initiatives.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: I've sent an update to Sarah regarding the current projects, including details about the **Vax4All Initiative** and **HEAP Project**. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to add or update!
